channel.title: Favorite Music, Bands, Genres, and/or Video
channel.description:
This is an all in one post for those of you who do not want to go bump and re-start old threads that have "already been posted"
Here is how the post look should be to keep order in this thread [code]Favorite Genres: Favorite Bands: Favorite Videos: Conclusion:[/code]
My... Favorite Bands: Mudvayne, Slipknot, Mushroomhead, Black Veil Brides, White Zombie, Spineshank, Steromud, Puddle of Mudd, Shinedown, Rob Zombie, HELLYEAH, rev theory, Alice in Chains, The Smashing Pumpkins, Papa Roach, Sixx: A.M., The Offspring, Greenday, Sum 41, Avenged Sevenfold, BRING ME THE HORIZON, Taproot, Staind, Nirvana, Yellowcard, Five Finger Death Punch, Korn, Abney Park, Escape the Fate, Black Sabbath, Otep, The Blank Theory. (and more)
Favorite Genre: Nu Metal, Metal, Twisted Metal, Hard Rock, Rock, Heavymetal, Punk, Steampunk, ect...
Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rh9Mtbe6Lkw&feature=related
No Conclusion
